jinngine.geometry.contact
Interface ContactGeneratorClassifier

public interface ContactGeneratorClassifier

A ContactGeneratorClassifier is used by the model to map between pairs of interfering geometries, and suited ContactGenerator instances, used by the ContactConstraint.

Author:
mo

Method Summary
 ContactGenerator createGeneratorFromGeometries(Geometry a, Geometry b)
          If the ContactGenerator created by this ContactGeneratorClassifier handles the geometries given, return a new instantiation of such a ContactGenerator.
 

Method Detail

createGeneratorFromGeometries

ContactGenerator createGeneratorFromGeometries(Geometry a,
                                               Geometry b)
If the ContactGenerator created by this ContactGeneratorClassifier handles the geometries given, return a new instantiation of such a ContactGenerator. If not, return null

Parameters:
a - any sub-type of Geometry
b - any sub-type of Geometry
Returns:
a new ContactGenerator suited to handle given geometries
